alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 10:33AM CDT until June 18 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clarke County in east central Mississippi... Southern Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1032 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Orange, or 13 miles northwest of Quitman, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Quitman and Sable around 1045 AM CDT. Middleton around 1050 AM CDT. Sykes around 1055 AM CDT. Crandall around 1100 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
